name: Chill Out (itch) (bbb0x, curricle, Azmio)
description:
Gone are the days of easy game jam platformers. We present a game so hard, our programmer got genuinely stuck on level 2. There are puzzles, there are challenges. But most of all there are bonus challenges !

Follow steve the fireball on a quest to cool.

Controls:

Space: Jump, Fire Canon, Glide (hold)

B: preview catapult, place catapult (within catapult place areas)

Q: Cancel catapult

Enter (+ direction): Dash (within torches)

Game Designer: Azmio

Programmers: b0x, Googol Planck

Composer/Sound Designers: Kayminet, nickmontopoli

Artist: curricle
